overview: See what made Lee Ryder a true Falcon legend! Four full-length scenes spanning Lee's stunning career with Falcon. Watch Lee, Rod, and Mark take a break from horseback riding, only to end up riding each other! Rick and Lee are enjoying each others company in the men's room when they are joined by a stranger, with explosive results. Scorching-hot, full-length scenes from some of Falcon's greatest titles make this collection a must own!
title: The Best of Lee Ryder
